messages: 55c04d3ca7e8dbc96e8dca76ab2a0e35 (03:43): /dev/null")
7c1792c03c5ce7d1af1119856c83a48a (03:56): Okay, I think I have ironed out the symptoms of my problem.
7c1792c03c5ce7d1af1119856c83a48a (03:56): When the box is reset, it starts with a "Rebooting with command: boot".
7c1792c03c5ce7d1af1119856c83a48a (03:56): I don't think it is supposed to say that, as that send me with the weird "requesting system maintenance mode"
7c1792c03c5ce7d1af1119856c83a48a (03:57): I think it should be by default "boot -m milestone=multi-user-server"
7c1792c03c5ce7d1af1119856c83a48a (03:57): Is that stored in the OBP or does anyone know?
e83262f8f35492a52c92c3aa09b87546 (03:57): lol, default should NEVER be SUM
e83262f8f35492a52c92c3aa09b87546 (03:57): I think Xenix used to do that too
7c1792c03c5ce7d1af1119856c83a48a (03:59): So I did a svcadm milestone -d milestone/multi-user-server:default
7c1792c03c5ce7d1af1119856c83a48a (04:00): maybe I left out the default..I'll check
a151f5d5372661fd903498bc13d6098e (04:03): From a hard day at wrok
7c1792c03c5ce7d1af1119856c83a48a (04:03): DataStream: I hear that, Im still at work.
7c1792c03c5ce7d1af1119856c83a48a (04:03): dammit, it did it again
7c1792c03c5ce7d1af1119856c83a48a (04:04): DataStream: I'm trying to learn the relationship between the smc and init.
7c1792c03c5ce7d1af1119856c83a48a (04:04): DataStream: I have narrowed my console login problem down to that being the issue
a151f5d5372661fd903498bc13d6098e (04:05): i *think* inetadm is for the legacy stuff
a151f5d5372661fd903498bc13d6098e (04:05): although it seems to be interchangeable
7c1792c03c5ce7d1af1119856c83a48a (04:05): I thought the whole prob was that the system was set to svcadm -d single user.
a151f5d5372661fd903498bc13d6098e (04:05): why did you want to stop X from starting?
a151f5d5372661fd903498bc13d6098e (04:06): all you have to do for that is disable dtlogin

7c1792c03c5ce7d1af1119856c83a48a (04:06): I didn't.,  I was reading on milestones and I was wanting to originally do maintenance.  But in my notes, I had -d there...and I forgot that was for chaning the milestone to the default and go ahead and go there.
7c1792c03c5ce7d1af1119856c83a48a (04:07): But init is seperate from smc, and I see that now
a151f5d5372661fd903498bc13d6098e (04:07): ok was someone else then before i went that wanted to stop X
7c1792c03c5ce7d1af1119856c83a48a (04:07): yeah, dtlogin...right,
7c1792c03c5ce7d1af1119856c83a48a (04:09): is the term "all" the same as ...oh...I bet that was my problem.
7c1792c03c5ce7d1af1119856c83a48a (04:09): I thought "multi-user-server" was the top spec, but it is "all"
a151f5d5372661fd903498bc13d6098e (04:10): Last SG's of the summer tonight *sob* *sob*
a151f5d5372661fd903498bc13d6098e (04:11): dam anoying that, splitting a series up in the middle
a151f5d5372661fd903498bc13d6098e (04:11): Hasues: stargates
7c1792c03c5ce7d1af1119856c83a48a (04:11): I like sci fi

a151f5d5372661fd903498bc13d6098e (04:12): its stupid, the first half gets shown in the US first, then it startes over here, and because there is a 3 month break in the middle in the US, we catch up to them on the second part
7c1792c03c5ce7d1af1119856c83a48a (04:14): yeah, that is strange
a151f5d5372661fd903498bc13d6098e (04:15): most big shows with around 20-22 episodes, the US breaks it up into summer and winter
a151f5d5372661fd903498bc13d6098e (04:15): that never happens over here
7c1792c03c5ce7d1af1119856c83a48a (04:17): I hate that in the US.
